reviews.review:
A more ambitious half life expansion, it is a good game if you want more HL goodness though not everything it adds works out well.

More focus on NPC following you with the same/worse AI, dodgy rope physics that you are meant to climb, minor weapon issues like the deagle having similar fire modes to the 9mm pistol but with different mechanics and most troubling having the horribly inaccurate as default, charge up wrench swing that I ended up using over shotgun double blast, teleporter gun where you can spend rare ammo and risk Xen platforming for barely any supplies and the optimal way to play involving waiting to gather regrowing ammo.

Bu oyunda baş kahraman freemanı avlamaya çalışan bir hükümet askerini oynuyoruz black mesadaki olayların gün yüzüne çıkmaması için herkesin ölmesi gereklidir. Ana karakterle HL1 deki dünyayı başka bir açıdan görüyoruz ve iki karakterdede bambaşka silahlar ve bambaşka düşmanları çıkarması şimdiki A+ oyunlarına taş çıkartır gelgelelim freemanı yakalama görevi bambaşka boyutlra yelken açıyor
比HF1难度要高，前段时间玩完并没有多少感触，我的情怀呢？
Buena historia, incluso es mucho mejor que el "Half-Life Blue Shift" por obvias razones (nuevas armas etc.), sin mas nada que decir, lo recomiendo.

When you're tasked with following up a hit 3D Shooter, the correct(?) decision is to make everything different. Opposing Force is the standout Half-Life expansion with its bevy of original content. New weapons, enemies, and a new squadmate mechanic make this game a very different experience from the first one. How well it matches up to the original's quality is questionable however. Opposing Force is a decidedly quicker experience, forgoing the long introduction and introducing new weapons at a much faster pace. Many of these new weapons, such as the Shock Roach and Desert Eagle, are fun to try out and find the very different niches for them. Because Half-Life was influenced by Quake, Opposing Force adds its own spin on Quake's CTF Flail. 
Where Opposing Force falls flat is in the squadmate mechanic, where you can command multiple soldiers to serve with you. Due to the narrow corridor-based aspect of the level design however, they'll be getting in your way more often than not. Fun story, if less interesting and nuanced than that of the first game.
The rope physics are adorably bad.
If you have to choose get this over Blue Shift.

Half-Life: Opposing Force is an expansion pack made by Gearbox. While you play as Gordon Freeman in the original game, this time around you take control of a marine called Adrian Shephard. Gearbox showed their creativity in this game and added a lot of weapons, new aliens, zombified marines, ropes and a glorious knife.

[b]pros[/b]
++ It adds new things to the Half-Life universe
+ Nods to the first Half-Life game
+ Interesting puzzles
+ Good maps
+ Health packs
+ Many weapons to choose from

[b]cons[/b]
- Like it's predecessor the final boss is bad.
- No subtitles and the voice acting is hit or miss
- Dumb friendly AI
- dated weapon sounds

[h1]Verdict[/h1]
I'd recommend buying Opposing Force if you liked playing Half-Life 1 and want to see the Black Mesa Incident from a marine's point of view. 

Replay value: Average
Rating: 8.0/10
Recommendation: Yes

Я решил в этом обзоре сообщить всю ценность этой игры.Ладно расмотрим и разложим по полочкам.Первые ощущение этой игры жилает лучшего (плохая прорисовка).Если чесно не знаю хорошо это или плохо , но я учился стрелять по этой игре и из-за этого я её уважаю.Во-вторых можно хорошо провести время , но если вы погрузитесь во всю суть этой игры.И подведём конец игра совсем не плохая , хвалю разрабодчиков.

Sérieusement : Cet addon est génial, j'ai plus kiffé (kiffer est dans le dictionnaire) cet addon d'Half-Life que Half-Life LE JEU !!!

L'histoire : Peter Parker se fait piquer par une araigner radioactive et commence à combattre le crime.   (Je veut pas spoiler parce que c'est trop bien !) (Et jouez à Half-life avant de jouez à "Opposing Force", c'est mieux)

Génialissime ! OVER 9000/10!

Stupidement : 

Ma vision est verte à cause de la weed dans ma visière. SnoopDogg/10.
Great expansion pack. Really sets the bar for what they can achieve.
Interesting POV and weapon range.
Great game recomend it!
经典

To start off don't play this game unless you've played Half Life 1, seeing as it expands on the story already seen in that game. Okay so those of you who have played Half Life 1, this game is a must play. As I said this game expands on the Half Life Universe, plus gameplay wise, you get a new selection of weapons, plus a few returning ones. This game actually feels more polished to me, it didn't have as many bugs as the first one. In the first game I couldn't count how many times I would randomly get stuck in a wall or floor, but it only happened to me once in this game, during the final boss. In the first game I came upon a glitch that forced me to use console commands to contiinue on, I didn't have that in this one. So all in all I feel this is actually a better game than Half Life 1, and anyone who enjoyed Half Life 1 should buy this one as well.

I give this game a 10/10

Первое официальное дополнение к первому Half-Life, и по мнению большинства - лучшее.
Это фактически отдельная игра. Разработчики из Gearbox постарались сделать свою первую игру очень интересной и качественной, что у них и получилось.
Разнообразие врагов, оружия, карт и остальных элементов - впечатляет.

Opposing Force - один из немногих представителей "настоящих дополнений"
Great old game that i have not played much of, but enjoyed the time i put into it

"Calm down, Joey. You need to take a break from that game."
8/10 would rage again

UPDATE: I enjoy how this game adds so much depth to the Half-Life world, but it can be SUPER difficult for inexperienced gamers. I would suggest playing some other FPS games before this one.

A great expansion pack to the main game . Worth playing even to this day ( same i say with goldeneye for n64) , very fun to witness the events from a different point of view. Just long enough. Just hard enough, great level design. Good weapon variety and enemy variety.
The only minor complaint is arguably the aiming. While the aiming works, sometimes the autoaim is a hindrance.
However a great fps game. And while fps isnt my fav genre , sometimes fps , especially when the fps is good and hard they tend to stick with me. Like this game , moh frontline, nolf, golden eye, perfect dark etc.
Recommended.
PS: play it after you done with the orginal.
Thanks for reading.
Good

A really great expansion to another really great game. Opposing Force shows a different perspective of the events of Half-Life, and it is really great to see why some things happend while playing as Gordon Freeman in Half-Life that occured because of playing as Shepard in Opposing Force. The gameplay and graphics are still the same, but this time I personally feel like the weapons are more unique and fun to use than the weapons that Gordon had. My only complaints are that certain parts of the game can feel a bit repetative and bland, because you have already seen it once before. Also some parts are frustratingly difficult and if you have low health you may get stuck in a loop of death for a while, as there are even less health pickups than in Half-Life, and the final boss is pretty lame in my opinion. Other than that, Opposing Force is a super solid expansion to a super solid game.

8.5/10

Fantastic DLC that is easily comparable to Half Life. 
New guns and enemies provide some fresh air and the game still manages to be just Half Life.
It's cool to see the whole situation from a marine perspective.

Люблю данную модификацию за Шепарда, за те моменты игры когда ты видел Фримана и прыгал за ним в мир Xzen и падал в неизвестность, когда всех твоих солдат убивали а ты оставался 1 и бил всех гаечным ключом как Фриман ломиком, когда вместо гаусса нам давали какую-то шарманку которой никто не пользовался.



Короче 10 мешков с дерьмом из 10.

Once again, amazing game. The Half Life series has been a blast for me and is probably one of the best single player franchises I ahve laid my hands on. It's cool to see what would've happened from the military's side. Definately worth the pruchase. Offers many hours of gameplay.
GET THE GAME DIRTBAG
If you like Half Life 1, you will love opposing forces.

本編で行った場所やフリーマンの姿が見ると嬉しくなるものですね

"Half-Life: Opposing Force" -  шутер от первого лица и самое известное дополнение для игры "Half-Life" (подробнее в моём обзоре на "Half-Life", разработанное компанией "Gearbox Software" и выпущенное "Sierra Entertainment" 31 октября 1999 года. Это дополнение представляет игроку тот же сеттинг (мир и события), что и оригинал, с той лишь разницей, что игрок берёт под своё управление капрала Адриана Шепарда, солдата спецподразделения "HECU".Я рекомендую эту игру каждому любителю серии "Half-Life".

Моя оценка игре: 9/10
I don't know why this has 60 hours
Достойное дополнение которое заставляет поразмыслить еще раз над всей загадкой half life. Покупать стоит. 8 из 10.
In my opinion its a great game

Ich bin ein großer Fan von diesem DLC und kann es nur weiterempfehlen.Ich finds fast besser als das eigentliche "Half-Life".Das schreibe ich,da mir die Waffen in diesem DLC viel einfallsreicher vorkommen als z.B. in "Half-Life".Auch ist das Spiel umfangreicher als z.B."Half-Life:Blue Shift".
Ich find jedoch sowieso die Idee genial,den "Black Mesa"-Vorfall aus verschiedenen Sichtweisen,verschiedener Personen zu erzählen.Wobei ich den Soldaten und die in diesem Spiel damit mitgehenden Möglichkeiten,z.B. andere Soldaten mitzunehmen,damit sie z.B. Türen mit dem Plasmabrenner aufschneiden,oder dich heilen,etc, besonders interessant finde.Ich finde dieses Spiel einfach nur super und denke,wenn man "Half-Life" gespielt hat,sollte man "Half-Life:Opposing Force" auch mal ausprobieren.
gg good campaign m8 10/10

On connait tous (ou presque) la série Half-Life (et surtout les memes par rapport à HL3), mais on connait moins les extensions de HL1 créées par Gearbox (Oui oui, les créateurs de la série Borderlands).

[i][b]Half-Life Opposing Force[/b][/i] est la première des deux extensions, sortie en 1999, soit 1 an après Half-Life 1.
Dans cette épisode, on incarne le caporal Shephard, qui est en mission de sauvetage. Pour sauver qui ? Gordon Freeman ! On peut d'ailleurs l'aperçevoir à un moment du jeu, quand il se téléporte vers la planète Xen.
Le gameplay, par rapport au 1, ne change pas, ou peu. Il y a l'ajout de plusieurs armes, dont le sniper !
Au niveau de l'histoire, comme d'hab', c'est assez obscure, on apprends pas grand chose de nouveau.
Au niveau du déroulement des niveaux, on est moins dans le puzzle, et surtout dans la baston. On passe moins de temps à se creuser la cervelle pour savoir où passer. Certains aimeront, d'autres moins.
On a un boss final bien sympa comparé à HL1, car plus compliqué à tuer (mais tout aussi dégueulasse :D)

Le seul aspect négatif qui apparait à mes yeux reste la durée de vie, 5-6h, ce qui est vraiment court, même pour une extension.

Bref, c'est un must-have si on veut poursuivre et rallonger notre temps dans l'univers de HL. A prendre en solde, ou avec le Half-Life Complete en solde.

_ _ _ _

Half-Life: Opposing Force is basicly about one of the grunts who were sent to the clean up project and he is imediatly thrown into the horrors of Black Mesa. but its got abit of stuff you are kinda misslead by. for example: he dosen't have to kill everyone. infact, he sorta needs them. its got good story and enviroment. speaking of which, you learn more stuff they were working on. its cool. and its only $4.99! buy it and its sure to meet your entertainment needs. it wont let you down sir or madam!
Good Game Clastic 10/10

What can I say?

This game rocks, yet sucks at the same time.

I definately reccomend this game, but there are still problems.

A large problem is the atmosphere. At many points in the game, the music cuts off. You're trying to do an epic battle, all while it's just gunfire around you. You can't throw the realism card down, mainly because this game is unrealistic as all get out.

Another problem is honestly the enemies, although, this is probably from the fact that I suck at most FPS games. The Race X aliens are extremely strong, and they make this the hardest of the Half Life games to beat.

Also, Boot Camp for some reason will not allow me to pass it. I get to the sniper section, and I hit the targets, yet they don't go down.

Why do I reccomend this game? Because essentially, it's probably the most story fueled one of the Half Life games, and yet it gets so little attention. It's a good game, and Gearbox did well with it. It puts the story forward, and it gives some hints that perhaps the Gman is more sinister than we believe...
Fajna gra, krótka

针锋相对，一个对戈登弗里曼爱的深沉的HECU队员在黑山基地的奇妙历险的FPS游戏，剧情紧扣HL1，Gman的戏份也明显增加。对于Gearbox来说在本作可以看到他日后的[strike]RPG[/strike]大作无主之地里的许多类似元素，电击伤害辣，腐蚀伤害辣，最终在传送门中出现的蠕虫BOSS辣，总之黑山基地的故事在蓝移与本作的补充下终于成为了完全体！[spoiler]物理学[/spoiler]圣剑万岁！管钳万岁！猎头蟹万岁！

Из всех дополнений оригинальной Half-Life - Opposing Force наиболее мне запомнилась своими интересными головоломками, хотя это и не совсем то, что я ценю в шутерах. Это ещё одна очень хорошая часть, которую обязательно стоит пройти всем поклонникам игры.

I'm Rick Harrison, and this is my pawn shop. I work here with my old man and my son, Big Hoss. Everything in here has a story and a price. One thing I've learned after 21 years - you never know what is gonna come through that door.
It's good

[b]Oyuncular tarafından oldukça sevilen oyun serilerinden birisi olan [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/70/HalfLife/]Half-Life[/url]'ın en gözde Standalone oyunlarından birisi olan Opposing Force ile beraberiz. Bu oyun ile beraber hikâyeyi farklı bir açıdan deneyimliyor ve bu kez Gordon Freeman yerine hükûmetin görevlendirdiği askerlerden birisi olan Adrian Shephard'ın yerine geçiyoruz. Dediğim gibi karakterimiz değişiyor ancak olay sırası ana oyun ile eş zamanlı olarak ilerliyor, hatta çoğu zaman Gordon Freeman'ı görme şansımız bile olabiliyor. Oyun gerçekten bir yan oyun olmasına rağmen hikâye işleyişine verilen önem beni gerçekten hayran bıraktı diyebilirim. Yapımı diğer noktalardan ele alırsak grafikleri ve oynanış mekanikleri olarak ana oyundan bir farkı bulunmuyor açıkçası. Eğer ana oyunu daha doğrusu [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/70/HalfLife/]Half-Life[/url]'ı oynadıysanız ve hikâyeyi farklı bir açıdan deneyimlemek istiyorsanız kütüphanenize eklemenizi ve en yakın zamanda denemenizi kesinlikle tavsiye ederim.

Not: Henüz yeni diyebileceğim bir firma olan [url=https://store.steampowered.com/search/?publisher=Tripmine%20Studios]Tripmine Studios[/url], yayınlayacakları oyun ile Half-Life'ın en sevilen iki yan oyunu olan Blue Shift ve Opposing Force'u güncel grafik ve mekaniklerle bizlere sunmayı amaçlıyor. Eğer ilginiz çekiyorsa [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/311810/Operation_Black_Mesa/]Operation: Black Mesa[/url] sayfası üzerinden oyuna göz atabilirsiniz.

Daha fazla inceleme için;
https://store.steampowered.com/curator/28040015[/b]

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2729712769

Nie mam pomysłu na wstęp, więc napiszę dwa słowa: Half-Life.

Fabuła: 
Historia rozpoczyna się w momencie incydentu w Black Mesie znanym z podstawki. Tamtejsze eksperymenty doprowadziły do inwazji dziwnych istot z innego wymiaru. Głównym bohaterem jest Adrian Shepherd - żołnierz należący do jednego z oddziałów, z którymi mierzyliśmy się w podstawce. Naszym zadaniem jest opanowanie sytuacji: Zaczynając na wyeliminowaniu stworów, a kończąc na uciszaniu (śmiertelnym) wszelkich naukowców, z biegiem czasu zaczynamy pościg za głównym bohaterem serii Gordonie Freemanie, by mierzyć się z coraz trudniejszymi wrogami.

Rozgrywka:
To po prostu Half-Life, więc formuła rozgrywki nie uległa znaczącym zmianom w stosunku do podstawowej wersji gry: Od czasu do czasu strzelamy, by zająć się spokojniejszymi rzeczami. takimi jak różnorakie łamigłówki czy współpraca z postaciami niezależnymi. Jeśli chodzi o ten aspekt względem podstawki z oczywistych względów możemy stanąć do walki ramię w ramię z innymi żołnierzami. Nie zmienia to jednak faktu, że przez większość gry jesteśmy samotni. Gra oferuje także szeroki zbiór przeciwników takich jak całkowicie nową „Rasę X”, której przedstawiciele często wdają się w walkę z Obcymi ze świata Xen. Napotykamy również ludzkich przeciwników w postaci zamaskowanych komandosów, którzy w obliczu porażki oddziałów wojskowych przybyli do Black Mesa w celu zniszczenia całego kompleksu, aby wyeliminować zagrożenie ze strony Obcych.

Mocne strony gry:
Plusem jest rzucone nowe światło na historię z podstawki oraz możliwość pokierowania postacią po drugiej stronie barykady. Jeśli chodzi o samą resztę to wszystko jest na podobnym poziomie zaczynając od strzelania a kończąc na zagadkach. Wszystkie te mechaniki są przyjemne przez co mamy te same doznania, które mieliśmy grając w oryginał. Dodatek ten pełen jest świetnych scen popychających nas naprzód, a sam klimat także robi robotę. Odgłosy zniszczonych korytarzy w których głębi grasuje coś o czym nie wiemy robi klimat niczym z horroru mimo, że gra ta grafiką już nie grzeszy. 

Słabe strony gry: 
Mimo że dodatek sam w sobie świetny to jest jednak strasznie krótki. Jeśli chodzi o inne minusy to można podać np. lekką schematyczność poziomów, sztuczną inteligencję i niewiele nowości.

Werdykt:
Ten dodatek ma w sobie to co miał Half-Life. Przyjemną historię, dobry klimat i rozgrywkę, czy trzeba coś więcej dodawać?
Great.

Самая неоднозначная история, как по мне. Вы - один из тех, кто противостоит нам в других историях.
Взгляд на события от лица военного, одного из "плохих парней" оригинала.

이거 그냥 돈남아서 해볼려고사고 플레이해봤는데  존잼 무슨 중독성이 이렇게심하면 하루만에 15시간할정도

MUCHO mejor que Half life Blue shift, en serio. Está un poco más largo pero pues tampoco por mucho, es un una expansión. Pero igual, alarga mucho el juego.
Tiene muchísimas más armas que los otros Half life, tiene armas que no esperaba que lo fueran. La historia es mucho más emocionante que la de Blue shift. También hay nuevos enemigos que no se vieron en los anteriores, y este personaje, en lo personal, se me hace más cool que el de Blue shift. Me agrada que aveces te ayudan soldados a combatir en algunas partes. Para mí, es mi favorita expansión de toda la saga Half life.
Lo recomiendo mucho si aún tienes ganas de más Half life jeje.
Great expansion. Play this before Blue Shift..it's better.

A good expansion for the first Half-Life game. Opposing force lets you don the boots of Adrian Shephard, a soldier from the HECU unit Gordon Freeman battles in Half-Life. The game plays it kind of safe story wise and is pretty much the same as Half-Life in that regard, with events running parallel to the first game. However there are a few more enemies and weapons to keep things interesting. In some parts of the game the level design maybe isn't as intuitive as it could be, I got stuck for a few minutes here and there. Everything good about the first game is still present here though. If you are a fan of the Half-Life series I recommend buying this game and considering the price, you can't go wrong!

(English)
Half-Life: Opposing Force is the first and most successful expansion pack to the famous game. 

His events again take us into the nightmarish events that occurred at Black Mesa, and allow nm to look at the situation on behalf of the Marines (the enemy in the first part) - Adrian Shephard. 

Quality - the addon is inferior to the original only in duration. In other respects, it largely complements the original game. From new locations, whether offices, warehouses, etc., many new enemies, and quite terrible and trudnoreshaemyh (even the new final boss is really the process of slaughter is much easier than the battle with Nihilanth). Accordingly, the atmosphere and the feeling of fear has increased, forcing us to save each cartridge, because the aliens are many, and they all want to kill you. Also introduced new weapons: wrench, Desert Eagle, M249, a sniper rifle, so you'll always find something to kill. 

The only negative in terms of plot the game does not supplements, and operates on the principle "same soup, but thicker lay," also the ending is a direct copy thereof, from the first part.

8 out of 10

Masterpiece !

great game. really nostalgic experience playing as Shephard and revisiting the half life 1 world through another character's eyes was very interesting. everything plays great, and the story ties into itself very neatly and feels like you are actually playing in time with the main game. lots of custom weapons and enemies create a very different, but familiar game. the weapons are different enough to make it seem like your playing a different game but in turn they all have that nostalgic and half life style vibe that constantly reminds you that your in the half life universe. amazing play, definetely worth the buy for a half life fan.

Несмотря на то, что игра довольно-таки старая, она очень хорошая, в некоторых местах интересные головоломки, в других "эпичные" перестрелки, некоторые моменты можно будет пройти за пару секунд, а где-то придется попотеть. Half-Life: Opposing Force is an enjoyable game that is sort of partnered with Half-Life: Blue Shift as an add-on for Half-Life 1. It includes new weapons and enemies and allows you to see the events of Half-Life 1 from a different perspective; meaning that you get different allies and enemies compared to the other Half-Life games. 

It also has unique events that occur that make the game more interesting and not seem to short, such as adding new, larger enemies and in some cases bosses, all of which weren't seen in any other Half-Life games which makes this one more original. 

In conclusion, I would recommend this game if you have already played the other games in the Half-Life 1 Anthology as it's graphics aren’t brilliant and the controls are quite difficult, which can take some time to get used to, and it's story wouldn't really make that much sense if you started with this one.
Нормас, отличное дополнение к хл
Лучшая... мать его... игра... серии!

This is one of the finest FPS games I've ever played. While Blue Shift was decent at best, this game is downright excellent. It feels right at home for a Half-Life game and is not alienated in any way, shape or form. It has amazing attention to detail and references to the original game feel very natural rather than being forced in to remind you that it's a Half-Life game. The puzzles in the game are challenging enough to be fun, but not on a level like Portal where it makes it the whole focus of the game. I was able to enjoy the new characters just as I did in the original, but there are two flaws with this game. Sometimes absurdley powerful enemys cake the map like an 11 year old's Mario Maker level. The other flaw is that it lacks music in some intense scenes making them a little underwhelming. Nonetheless, it's definetly worth the play.

Half-Life: Opposing Force - обычная игра, пытающаяся выехать на популярности оригинала. Никакой оригинальности в сюжете, никаких изменений в механике... Просто халфа на других картах. Прошел для галочки. 5\10
Que no les engañen mis horas, lo poco que lo jugué fue offline. 3/10. Aburrido.

Pretty nice but short expansion set in the Half-Life Universe. Sometimes you get stuck figuring out how to progress forward, but it's nothing major.

Half-Life: Opposing Force is personally my preferred expansion pack to the original Half-Life and quite possibly my favourite original Half-Life game in general. What I like about this game is how different it is as it puts you into the perspective of a US marine which  gives you a whole new side of the story that wasn't introduced in Half-Life or Blue Shift such as how they had no previous knowledge about how they were going to be ordered to kill all the scientists in the Black Mesa research facility and for the most part many soldiers disagree with this and retaliate against their instructors and try to make it out of this whole dilemma alive. Throughout the game you will encounter various scenarios and events in the game that you will recognize as events that took place in the original HL but showing how it impacted the marines. Another thing that makes this game different is the various weapons and enemies that are exclusive to this particular game which makes this game feel fresh and makes it have a different feel to it in comparison to the other Half-Life games. [spoiler] It also has a final boss that isn't a total fυck up like in Half-Life.[/spoiler] If you enjoy Half-Life and are up for a challenge, especially near the end, then I highly recommend this game!
Recomendo apenas pra quem curte HALF-LIFE...

If you have and like Half-Life, this is for you. It's interesting to play as a member of the HECU, and to see the Black Mesa Incident from his perspective. There's different abilities, such as climbing/swinging on ropes, and you get night vision instead of a flashlight. Some different weapons are available, such as a pipe wrench, a knife, a Desert Eagle, and a sniper rifle. One thing that I really liked is the fact that you can lead other Marines into combat, and make use of their abilities, like an engineer's ability to cut through locked doors, or the medic's ability to function like a mobile health station that never runs out. It's shorter than Half-Life, but a bit longer than Blue Shift. You should give this a try. Also, my playtime on record is not accurate, I spent 98% of my time playing this offline.
great expansion and it is worth your money

It's like Half Life, (which is a must have game).
Except it has more weapons, more enemies, different character, different areas, etc.

Basically, if you liked the original, you will for sure love this one as well. Just note that it does get much more difficult than the original, because of the pesky new enemies.

100/100

Classic
本作是半条命的一代资料片，咱们扮演的的是一名特战队员，前来解决黑山基地的问题，但是因为某些问题飞机坠毁，咱能被一位科学家所救，游戏传承了半条命出色的优点，但是半条命的缺点也同意存在，游戏到后期显得有些无聊，但是耐玩度和可玩性依然很高，新增了一些半条命没有的怪物，很推荐入手，补充了半条命的剧情，剧情线在半条命主角前往Xen星球后发生的事情，具体就不做太多介绍，自己玩玩就知道
